divs: sighting detailsfirst started, my brother, mike halligan, was on a cruise ship to cozumel with family. it was about 11:30 p.m. on 11-23-06. looked like an orb! close by was a ufo. the orb was round in shapeand very bright white\light blue. the ufo was round and had several colors,-blue, red, purple, pink, yellow, orange, green. the orb flew into the ufo, then the ufo left sporadically.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Galveston
There were no other sightings in Galveston on or around November 23rd 2006
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
